title: lightning calendar print problems
content:
Two problems have been encountered. Multiple Google calendars are involved. Display works correctly, but: 1. Not all (Google) calendars show on the print. 2. For those calendars that show up, the items show up in their colors on the display, but not on the print.

I normally use the normal release (currently TB 102.13.0), but have also upgraded to 115.0 with the same results.
creator: dougschuess1

title: Hotmail authentication window keeps showing up
content:
Hi,

I updated Thunderbird to the latest 115 version this morning, and a strange microsoftonline.com authentication pop up has been showing up since then every time Thunderbird checks if there's new email from hotmail.com. How do I get rid of this pop up window?

Thanks, Tang
creator: tanghonglai
